message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is my firm price.  I'm willing to part with it for that amount, but I can't go any lower.
